attributes.action: Ban the use of glass bottles in night clubs
attributes.additional_details: I want all nightclubs to switch to polycarbonate bottles rather than glass as I was recently a victim of a crime involving a glass bottle being thrown at my head and smashed around my eye. Now scarred for life with 17 stitches around my eye and forehead. Please support my aim to get everyone switched over to polycarbonate and stop this happening to others.
